thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com | 5 of 141
thread.title: Lyndon

author: Lyndon
title: Lyndon
text: We really like Mable's labels for our ten year old boy. The ordering is easy, the delivery was really quick and the price is good compared with other label places. The labels themselves work great and I think the package choices were pretty good. But - we were hoping for more design choices for his age group. Lots of little kid stuff, but as you go into the older packages there are just plain designs and colors - but not many things like the peace sign designs we chose for him. A few more older kid choices would be better - but we like the peace sings and we're happy with what we got.
